DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to examine whether the Chinese herbal formula (KSY) is effective on HCV Carrier With Abnormal Liver Function.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Chinese Herbal Formula (KSY) on HCV Carrier With Abnormal Liver Function
DOC.detailed_description: percentage of change on HCV RNA titer and liver function (GPT).
DOC.criteria: 40 < GPT <200 HCV carrier Age: 1865 yrs old Creatinine >2.0 mg/dL Total bilirubin > 2.0mg/dL Not suitable patients diagnosis by physician in charge.
